title: Ask cowboy questions, get cowboy answers
desc: transfer problems into cowspace to solve them

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I do most of my thinking 
 through cows
panels.hovertext: I've solved a load of problems this way

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
I arrange them into different 
 shapes in the corral
panels.hovertext: I've solved a load of problems this way
